title: The Harsh Cry of the Heron
description: Lord Otori Takeo and his consort Kaede have ruled the Three Countries for over 16 years. Their success has attracted the attention of the distant Emperor and his general, the warlord Saga Hideki, who covet all the wealth of the Three Countries, and especially Takeo's heir, his eldest daughter, Shigeko, now of marriageable age.
author: Lian Hearn
